code: import{createStore,applyMiddleware,compose}from"redux";import{composeWithDevTools}from'redux-devtools-extension';import thunk from"redux-thunk";import rootReducer from'./reducers';var initialState={};var middleware=[thunk];var composeEnhancers=composeWithDevTools();var store=createStore(rootReducer,initialState,compose(applyMiddleware.apply(void 0,middleware),window.devToolsExtension&&window.devToolsExtension()));export default store;
